Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma will be leading the Indian side in the ODI series
Charith Asalanka has been named the new ODI captain of Sri Lanka
Riyan Parag, Shivam Dube and Harshit Rana have earned their maiden call-ups to the ODI side
India will be high on confidence after the T20I series win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka were outplayed in the T20I series
The surface at R. Premadasa Stadium is expected to be a well-balanced one
There won't be ideal conditions for a game of cricket in Colombo on Friday. There is a 70% chance of rain predicted
Others: The three-match ODI series between Sri Lanka and India kicks off on Friday, August 2, with the first game to be played at R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo
India whitewashed Sri Lanka in the three-match T20I series
Sri Lanka, meanwhile, will be low on morale

Sri Lanka vs India Head-to-Head: Sri Lanka and India have met 168 times in the 50-over format. Sri Lanka have emerged victorious on 57 occasions whereas India have won 99 times. One match ended in a tie and 11 games ended in no-result

Sri Lanka vs India Match Prediction: India were fantastic in the T20I series and whitewashed Sri Lanka. The hosts will have to fire in unison to put up a fight against the upbeat Indians who will be looking to carry forward the winning momentum in the ODI series. Prediction: India to win this contest.
Sri Lanka vs India Live Streaming details and channel list: TV: Sony Sports Network, Live Streaming: Sony LIV App
